name: Wizards vs Undeads
description:
Wizards vs Undeads is a game developed as a final project of the Game Developer course from Pontifical Catholic University of Minas Gerais.

Bring the three crystals to the altar in the middle of the Town to save the city!

The Team behind the game:
  • André Piazarollo - 3D Artist
  • Cristiano Rodriguês - 3D Artist
  • Frederico Machado - Programmer
  • João Vitor de Brito - Progammer 
  • Vinicius Augusto - UI/UX
